--action-text-default-color.description: default color for interactive text elements like nav items

--action-text-hover-color.description: hover color for interactive text elements like nav items

--action-text-active-color.description: active color for interactive text elements like nav items

--action-indicator-hover-color.description: hover color for interactive indicator elements like nav items

--action-indicator-active-color.description: active color for interactive indicator elements like nav items

--block-title-de-emphasized-color.description: color for de-emphasized text, applicable only on H1 and H2 (optional)

--break-shadow-light-color.description: break shadow color when the bottom block is secondary (black)

--break-shadow-dark-color.description: break shadow color when the bottom block is primary(yellow), tertiary (white) or quaternary (gray)
